availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Brown (Independence, KY Merchant/Justice of the Peace)

body.p: Independence, Kentucky, merchant and justice of the peace. Ohio native. Married to Martha A. Brown. Father of Emma S. Brown and IdaBelle Brown. Merchant in Independence in 1860. Justice of the Peace in Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Kenton County, Independence, p. 5; KYR-0001-007-0307.
